title: Composer of the Sri Lanka National Anthem Ananda Samarakoon’s birth centenary commemorates
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) The composer of the Sri Lankan National Anthem, artiste and late musician Ananda Samarakoon’s 100th birth anniversary was commemorated at Temple Trees on 13 January. President Mahinda Rajapaksa graced the occasion as the Chief Guest and said that the best honour can be awarded to…
